nodes.name: Configure_Extract_JSON_Fields
nodes.description: Extract fields from a JSON column in the table
nodes.title: Configure: Extract JSON Fields

nodes.name: Add_Field
nodes.lql: `SELECT "chris.botelho@logichub.com" AS email_recipient, "Latest TOR Exit Nodes" AS email_subject, "Attached is the latest report of TOR exit nodes." AS email_body, * FROM Configure_Extract_JSON_Fields`
nodes.title: Add Email Fields

nodes.name: SMTP
nodes.description: Simple Mail Transfer Protocol (SMTP) is a standard communication protocol for sending email messages on business networks and the Internet.
nodes.title: Send Email

nodes.description: Manipulating files through the file integrations API
nodes.title: Grab URL

descriptor.name: SMTP
descriptor.description: Simple Mail Transfer Protocol (SMTP) is a standard communication protocol for sending email messages on business networks and the Internet.

steps.name: SMTP Server and Account Authentication
steps.description: Enter authentication information for your SMTP connection

inputs.description: Label for this integration instance.
inputs.label: Label

inputs.description: Define variables here to templatize integration connections and actions. For example, you can use https://www.{{hostname}}.com, where hostname is a variable defined in this input.
inputs.label: Reference Values

inputs.description: Select option to verify connecting server's SSL certificate (Default is Verify SSL Certificate)
inputs.label: Verify SSL

inputs.description: Server name for your SMTP connection
inputs.label: SMTP Server Name

inputs.description: Server port for your SMTP connection
inputs.label: SMTP Server Port

inputs.description: Authentication type for your SMTP connection
inputs.label: Authentication type

inputs.description: Whether or not to use encryption
inputs.label: Use encryption

inputs.description: Email Address to send from
inputs.label: Email Address

inputs.description: Username if different from Email Address
inputs.label: Username

inputs.description: Password to log in with. Leave empty if using None Authentication type.
inputs.label: Password

actions.name: Send Email
actions.description: Sends an e-mail to a recipient using SMTP

steps.name: Create and Send Email
steps.description: Create and send an email using column names from the parent table

inputs.description: A column containing the subject title for e-mails
inputs.label: Subject Column name

inputs.description: A column containing the body for outbound e-mails
inputs.label: Body Column name

inputs.description: A column containing the e-mail addresses to send an e-mail to
inputs.label: Column containing the e-mail address for recipients

inputs.description: A column containing the e-mail addresses as sender to send an e-mail to
inputs.label: Column containing the from e-mail address

inputs.description: Select type of email body (Default is Plain Text)
inputs.label: Type

inputs.description: Column containing e-mail addresses to attach as cc on an outbound e-mail
inputs.label: CC on outbound e-mail Column Name

inputs.description: Column containing e-mail addresses to attach as bcc on an outbound e-mail
inputs.label: BCC on outbound e-mail Column Name

inputs.description: Column containing one or more file IDs to attachment. (Can be a comma separated string of lhub_file_id values or a json dict in the format of {"<lhub_id>":"<file_name>"})
inputs.label: File Attachment

inputs.description: If no file name is provided, add this extension to attached files.
inputs.label: Attachment File Extension

inputs.description: Time to wait between consecutive API requests in milliseconds (Default is 0 millisecond)
inputs.label: Time between consecutive API requests (in millis)

inputs.description: Timeout in seconds (Default is 360 seconds)
inputs.label: Action Timeout

inputs.description: Number of rows to read from parent table
inputs.label: Rows to Process

inputs.description: Count of threads to use for processing rows of input table (Default is 1 thread)
inputs.label: Count of threads

actions.name: Send static email, If table is empty
actions.description: Sends an e-mail to a recipient with static input if table is empty

inputs.description: Subject title for e-mails
inputs.label: Subject

inputs.description: Body for outbound e-mails
inputs.label: Body

inputs.description: E-mail addresses to send an e-mail to
inputs.label: E-mail address for recipients

inputs.description: E-mail addresses as sender to send an e-mail to
inputs.label: From E-mail address

inputs.description: Select type of email body (Default is Plain Text)
inputs.label: Type

inputs.description: E-mail addresses to attach as cc on an outbound e-mail
inputs.label: CC on outbound e-mail

inputs.description: E-mail addresses to attach as bcc on an outbound e-mail
inputs.label: BCC on outbound e-mail

inputs.description: Timeout in seconds (Default is 360 seconds)
inputs.label: Action Timeout

actions.name: Save Table as PDF
actions.description: Save data of parent table into a PDF file

inputs.description: Title of PDF Document positioned at top center. Position can be customized using `Additional Options` input below.
inputs.label: Document Title

inputs.description: Provide an HTML table row item (maybe with custom HTML formatting) representing a header row. You can also provide a comma-separated list of headers to use (Default is parent table headers without any special HTML formatting). For example: <tr><th>Column 1</th><th>Column 2</th><th>Column 3</th></tr>
inputs.label: Header Row

inputs.description: Table style definition (e.g. CSS styling such as borders, padding, etc.)
inputs.label: Table Style Definitions

inputs.description: Jinja templated HTML definition for each row. (Default is `{{col1}}{{col2}}{{col3}}`). Nested table is supported using `` custom tag as: `{{json_column}}`. You can also use hidden columns like `lhub_id` or `lhub_page_num` here (provide it templated as `{{lhub_id}}`).
inputs.label: Per Row Template

inputs.description: Select Orientation of the final PDF document. (Default is Portrait)
inputs.label: Orientation

inputs.description: Json containing options like margin-bottom, margin-left, page-size (page-height or page-width for more fine grained control on page-size) etc for pdf. Refer https://help.logichub.com/docs/file-tools#save-table-as-pdf. Set an additional `debug` key in json (with any value) to display the raw html output.
inputs.label: Additional Options

inputs.description: Timeout in seconds (Default is 360 seconds)
inputs.label: Action Timeout

inputs.description: Number of rows to read from parent table
inputs.label: Rows to Process

inputs.description: Count of threads to use for processing rows of input table (Default is 1 thread)
inputs.label: Count of threads

inputs.label: Row Limit

inputs.description: Timeout in seconds (Default is 360 seconds)
inputs.label: Action Timeout
